channel.title: Runescape new armour style and other updates
channel.description:
What do you all think of it? Personally I think it looks too much like the dung armour :/
Also just found out they moved the witches house, and there is a new mine in fally. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ITc2F.png[/img] Taverly [hr] [hr] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VaHIm.png[/img] New armour look. [hr] [hr] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uSYwW.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CX2iA.png[/img] ::Thieving?"

item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:63, topic:431343”]inb4stellardawnisthenewdukenukem.

I wouldn’t be surprised if they just cancel development of it, idk why[/quote]
cancel it Again?
also this was interesting
http://www.stellardawncentral.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=19018&st=0

item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

shrogg:

Stellar dawn is the most delayed piece of shit around, i have been waiting for it since it was MechScape, and they have not released a single screenshot since they started up the game…

I know right, there hasn’t been any news on that game since shortly after they launched the site.

item.title: Runescape new armour style and other updates
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:48, topic:431343”][quote author=Mr Mopar link=topic=534022.msg3904659#msg3904659 date=1328121439]

I remember the days when rs was a fun medieval like game

Still is.
[/quote]This isn’t fucking medieval. All of the GFX updates they made to the game made it look more like a Sci-Fi Game.[/quote]

???

If you want Sci-Fi, take a look at Stellar Dawn. Runescape does not even come close to Sci-Fi.

Read full topic

item.source: Runescape new armour style and other updates

item.title: Runescape new armour style and other updates
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“baddy351, post:56, topic:431343”]You guys just say it looks advanced because you are used to the shitty old models. They needed redone. I personally think they did a decent job, just made em look too expensive.
In NO way do they look high-tech. They look like they are medieval, just better and more realistic than before. Stop being mad over these updates. IMO they ruined the game a long long time ago. But they are trying. So at least give them that

tl;dr
They are trying, so give em credits. The armor does not look high tech.[/quote]I’m not saying there is anything wrong with the armor I am just saying they should have higher priorities.

Read full topic
item.source: Runescape new armour style and other updates

item.title: Runescape new armour style and other updates
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

You guys just say it looks advanced because you are used to the shitty old models. They needed redone. I personally think they did a decent job, just made em look too expensive.
In NO way do they look high-tech. They look like they are medieval, just better and more realistic than before. Stop being mad over these updates. IMO they ruined the game a long long time ago. But they are trying. So at least give them that

tl;dr
They are trying, so give em credits. The armor does not look high tech.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape new armour style and other updates
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:52, topic:431343”][quote author=Mr Mopar link=topic=534022.msg3904713#msg3904713 date=1328127674]

I remember the days when rs was a fun medieval like game

Still is.
[/quote]This isn’t fucking medieval. All of the GFX updates they made to the game made it look more like a Sci-Fi Game.

So you think Runescape looks like Halo?

What does that has to do with halo?
U might go look up the definition of sci-fi[/quote]
I already know what it means, in no way does runescape look like it has any advanced technology or is based in the future.

Science fiction is a genre of fiction dealing with the impact of imagined innovations in science or technology, often in a futuristic…

Read full topic
